text: Nina Ivanova (6 January 1934 â€“ 1 December 2020) was a Russian-Soviet actress. She was born in Moscow. Ivanova's career began in 1944. Her best known roles were in Once There Was a Girl (1944), Spring on Zarechnaya Street (1956), An Easy Life (1964) and There Is Such a Lad (1964). Ivanova died on 1 December 2020 in Moscow at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian television actors Category:Russian stage actors Category:Actors from Moscow
title: Nina Ivanova
